text: Esmeralda Agoglia (29 August 1923 – 21 October 2014) was an Argentine prima ballerina, choreographer and director of Argentina's Ballet Estable. ==Early life== Agoglia was born in Buenos Aires, Argentina. ==Career== Agoglia joined the Ballet Estable at the Teatro Colón in Buenos Aires in 1942. From 1949 to 1976, she was the company's prima ballerina. In 1989, she received the Konex Award for her work as a ballerina. ==Death== She died in 21 October 2014. She was 91 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Tribute to Esmeralda Agoglia * Esmeralda Agoglia Category:1923 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Ballerinas Category:People from Buenos Aires
title: Esmeralda Agoglia
